pages.text: $(li)Careful! Don't be fooled by that chest. There is a goblin inside!$(br)$(li)Mimics may drop a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/chest)Chest$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/iron_ingot)Iron Ingots$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/gold_ingot)Gold Ingots$(/l) or a $(l:patchouli:armors/ring_of_stealth)Ring of Stealth$(/l) on death.
